Name: Super Weapon Master
About the game: Super Weapon Master is an action rogue-like game where you kill hordes of enemies and face powerful bosses. Choose from powerful relics with their own unique attributes, while acquiring a variety of weapons in different styles. Enhance your character by learning related skills for weapons. Play as a weapon master, strengthen your character with gold upgrades earned each game, and unlock new characters. So as to get a better gaming experience. ------------------------------------------------------------------- Reasonable collocation Reasonable mix of weapons, upgrades and relic choices. Cultivate your own unique genre. 。 。 。 Adjust time acceleration at will Click the left button to speed up or slow down at any time during the battle. Let you get a smoother gaming experience. Freely set the aiming method of the weapon Aiming can be set individually for each weapon. Mouse Aim or Auto Aim. Maximize weapon output. Powerful artifact Each artifact has a unique effect. The right choice of relics can turn your battles upside down Super weapon By collecting specific weapon combinations. Can synthesize super weapons. All kinds of super weapons have the strength to sweep thousands of troops. Try to choose upgrade options for the purpose of synthesizing super weapons. Before combination After combination Game Features More than 20 unique weapons. There are magic, firearms, cold weapons. There is always one that will satisfy you. 10 super weapons. Super weapons have the power to sweep thousands of troops 30+ powerful artifacts. Some relics can turn your battles upside down. Over 80 upgrade options guarantee a completely different gaming experience every game ------------------------------------------------------------------- Author's words： The game is independently developed by the author. A person's personal development ability is limited. But the author will try to collect feedback from players. Strive to satisfy all players' suggestions and opinions. Thanks! The game uses a lot of paid commercial materials from the Unity store. If you see the same material elsewhere. It was purely using the same paid commercial material. The author has lost his job at home because of the company's bankruptcy last year. Due to the new crown pneumonia and many other reasons. Haven't found the ideal job. To pay off mortgages and loans. We can only pin our hopes on this game. I hope you can help the author to spread the word. Wishing me through this difficult time. The author would like to thank everyone in advance！
